patterns.name: Radiant Grid
patterns.svgMarkup:
<svg viewBox="0 0 400 240" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="240" fill="{bg}" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="120" r="80" fill="{fg}" />
  <rect x="0" y="220" width="400" height="20" fill="{acc}" />
<svg viewBox="0 0 400 240" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="240" fill="{bg}" />
  
  <!-- Accent grid lines -->
  <path d="M0 60h400M0 120h400M0 180h400M100 0v240M200 0v240M300 0v240" stroke="{acc}" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.4"/>

  <!-- Foreground radiating circle -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="120" r="60" fill="{fg}" opacity="0.9"/>
  <circle cx="200" cy="120" r="30" fill="{acc}" opacity="0.7"/>
</svg>

patterns.name: Petal Bloom
patterns.svgMarkup:
<svg viewBox="0 0 400 240" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="240" fill="{bg}" />

  <!-- Reusable flower symbol -->
  <defs>
    <g id="flower">
      <!-- 8 petals -->
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" />
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(45)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(90)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(135)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(180)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(225)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(270)"/>
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-26" rx="10" ry="26" fill="{fg}" transform="rotate(315)"/>
      <!-- Center -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="10" fill="{acc}" />
    </g>
  </defs>

  <!-- Flower placements -->
  <use href="#flower" x="80"  y="70"  />
  <use href="#flower" x="200" y="120" />
  <use href="#flower" x="320" y="70"  />
  <use href="#flower" x="120" y="180" transform="scale(0.9)"/>
  <use href="#flower" x="280" y="180" transform="scale(0.9)"/>
</svg>
